thread.section_title: Officewonderland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Officewonderland | officewonderland.com
thread.title: Colton Redwine

author: Colton Redwine
title: Colton Redwine
text: I ordered three projectors online, and a salesman contacted me before placing the order to confirm I knew what I was ordering. Sure enough, I'd overlooked something, and wasn't ordering what I actually needed. The Salesman, Mike, then worked with me to figure out what I needed, what my budget was, and then ultimately ended up finding me something that was actually far better than what I had ordered in the first place! Very pleased with these guys.
